In England, in the seven days to 08 September, there were 187,840 new confirmed cases (332.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 September, there were 175,682 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (12,158 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 September is 6,218,198 (10,995.9 cases per 100,000 population).
